articles.title: Signs of vitamin b12 deficiency seen in women - The Times of India
articles.description: Let's take a look at the symptoms of vitamin b12 deficiency.
articles.content: A deficiency of B12 would lead to nausea, constipation, bloating, gas, and diarrhea in our bodies. Therefore, if youre observing these symptoms more, opt for a B12 test.
